content.description:
Thomas Nast, “Uncle Sam’s Thanksgiving Dinner,” 1869, drawn in support of the Fifteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution
Courtesy of the Library of Congress
content.question: The change in society claimed by the artist in the image was most challenged by

choices.label: the creation of the Republican Party.
the construction of canals and railroads.
the passage of laws promoting economic development in the West.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
